page.title: 14My day and favourite game
page.content: I got up and got dressed. I had Weetabix for my breakfast. I dressed Linsey my doll. Then my Mum took Shelley and me down to her friend's because she was going to work. At dinner time Shelley and I went to get some chips. When we had our dinner I took Kerry over to the play area. We were there about half an hour.Then I took her home. We had beans, sausages and mash for tea. We watched Hi de Hi on the television and went to bed at nine o'clock..Beverley Saunders { {My favourite game}is{Connect 4.}I play with my Dad and my friends.You need 2 players.One has 20 red counters and the other has 20 blue.In the frame there are 7 holes along and 6 holes up. You have alternate turns.You have to get 4 counters in a row,up,down or diagonally.I win sometimes.Mark Andras
